meanings: Adverb 옛글투 또는 반어적 <질문부탁 등을 할 때 please와 같은 의미로 씀>

vlive.korean: 제가 그러면 'PRAY' 불러줄까요? Then should I sing "PRAY" for you? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 월요일 유겸이
vlive.english: Then should I sing "PRAY" for you?

vlive.korean: 'PRAY' 좋아요 영어 학원 갔다 왔어요? "PRAY" is good. You went to English academy? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 월요일 유겸이
vlive.english: "PRAY" is good. You went to English academy?

vlive.korean: 여러분 'PRAY' 듣고 싶죠? You want to hear "PRAY", don't you? 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) HOTLINE #9
vlive.english: You want to hear "PRAY", don't you?

vlive.korean: 기도 아무때나 그렇게 막 해도 되는 건가요? Can you pray at any time like that? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#457. 상상플러스 (스페셜 DJ 틴탑 니엘&리키 with 라붐)
vlive.english: Can you pray at any time like that?

vlive.korean: [안녕~] 내일 감기 안 걸리게 기도해줘용~ [Bye~] Pray that we won't catch colds~ 듣기 View video VICTON : TVicton EP.81 (두 댕댕이의 수영장 나들이~)
vlive.english: [Bye~] Pray that we won't catch colds~

examples.korean: to pray for the salvation of the world 듣기 Add to Wordbook 세상의 구원을 위해 기도하다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to pray for the salvation of the world Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’ll pray for you. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 너를 위해 기도할게. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ll pray for you. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Let us pray, brethren. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 신도 여러분, 기도합시다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Let us pray, brethren. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: What, pray, is the meaning of this? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이것의 의미가 무엇인가요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: What, pray, is the meaning of this? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The hands that help are holier than the lips that pray. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 돕는 손이 기도하는 입술보다 더 성스럽다. (서양속담, 친구속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: The hands that help are holier than the lips that pray. Add to Wordbook
